title: Girls of Spider Island (1960 Horror) He strangles his victims with his mammoth claws!

sources.title: Girls of Spider Island (1960 Horror) He strangles his victims with his mammoth claws!
sources.description:
Shock upon shock! Terror upon terror!
A team of chorus girls finds themselves caught in a deadly web when they are shipwrecked on a remote South Seas island. The lush, tropical isle seems an ideal place to await their rescue, but hidden in the jungle are giant poisonous spiders. A venomous bite transforms the girls' escort into a disfigured beast, half-man and half-insect. Consumed with lust and craving blood, the monster hunts down the defenseless girls and slaughters them one by one. The ensuing panic drives the dancers to squabble and fight amongst themselves until they realize that their only hope for survival is to work together in a final stand against the monster...

Original title: Ein Toter hing im Netz (1969) AKA: Horrors of Spider Island, A Corpse Hung in the Web, Girls of Spider Island

Black & White version: https://youtu.be/7P0wm-lypVk


Director: Fritz Böttger
Writers: Fritz Böttger, Eldon Howard, Albert G. Miller
Genres: Colorized, Horror, Science Fiction, Exploitation
Main Cast: 
Harald Maresch as Joe
Helga Franck as Georgia
Alexander D'Arcy as Gary
Helga Neuner as Ann
Dorothee Parker as Gladys
Gerry Sammer as May
Helma Vandenberg as Kate
Barbara Valentin as Babs


00:00 Full Colorized Movie
01:55 Auditions for a dancing troupe in Singapore lead to hiring dancers with various backgrounds and talents.
07:29 Survivors of a plane crash find land, water, and hope after days adrift on the ocean.
20:34 Group of women stranded on an island discover a dead man in a cabin with a mysterious creature lurking.
24:23 Girls on an island face danger as they are hunted by a mysterious killer.
35:35 A group find themselves in danger on a deserted island after a mysterious disappearance.
48:06 Stranded on an island they await rescue, with romantic tensions and mysterious disappearances.
54:17 A tale of love, jealousy, and betrayal unfolds among a group of dancers in a tropical setting.
1:01:51 A group of girls on an island encounter a dangerous creature with claws, leading to a series of events.
